div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said' day Richerde bernys one that ane parte Ande margaret blak one that
vthir part with Consent of Androw vmfray hir' spous' was oblist and suorne
the gret bodelie aithe to stande and abid' at the finale decret and deliuer
ance of thomas leslie Duncan Crail Jonhne ramsay and Alexander blair'
arbitoris and amicabile componitouris chosin betuix thame quhilkis was suorne
the gret aithe to giffurtht thar deliuerance and decret in ale and Sindrie
debatis clames and contrauersiis debatabile betuix thame betuix this and sonday
that next cumis

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' patry
leslie forspekar that Alexander blair' Is borghe' to Williame Kelle for ix s'
for thome vit quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of
law

The said day the Court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome
that Jonhne low hed' falyeit in his preiwe anent the tua stane of yrne
quhilkis he tuk to preiwe he resauit nocht fra Androw lousone and aw to
pay him for the said' tua stane of yrne

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day within xv dais to Alexander Prat
to ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Alexander Iruyn for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of xlij li' of woll be ane wranguis' wechte with the
quhilkis he resauit his wole fra him wif and Alexander blair' et cetera as day of
peremptour Ande In likuis' thai assignit to the said' Alexander Iruyn to bring with
him Sandy Symsone his mane and Ansuer to the said' Alexander prat
anent xvij s' clamit aving him the said' day as day of peremptour with
consent of batht the said' partiis'

The saide day cristj Walcar' in the Name of his wif conuict be ane suorne assis'
patry leslie forspekar for trubulance of Jok Wellis for the quhilkis he was in
amerciament of the court et cetera Atour it was ordanit be the said' that the said cristj sal pay the leche
for the hurting of the said' child' and pay to him v s' be fasterinevin next hereftir for the
skatht he has Sustenit becaus' the said' cristj ansuerd' for his wyf et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
quinto die mensis februarij Anno quo supra

The said day Androw skynner was conuict' be ane suorne
assis' James colisone forspekar for the tribulance of Androw
burnat for the quhilkis he was in ane amerciament of the
court and' to amend as law will et cetera And' the said'
Androw burnat quyt of ale tribulance of the said Androw
skynner And' the said partijs was oblist be the faithtis of
thar bodiis to stand and' abid at the deliuerance of the
said assis' for the amendis Quhilkis deliuerit be the said'
James colisone that the said' Androw skynner sale ger mak an'
wax candile contenand j li' and cum one sonday that nixt cumis in
tyme of the hie mes' and' syt done one his kne and' ask
the said' Androw burnat forgevnes and offir the said candill to
the haliblud lycht And gif euere he tribulis the said Androw burnat
in tym to cum and' beis conuict tharof he sale pay xl s' to sanct nicho
les wark vnforgevin And' gif the said' Androw skynner failyes
in the fulfilling of the saidis deliuerance in the offering of the
said' candill and' askin forgevnes he sale stand xxiiij houris
in the goif

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto
die mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit monunday the viij day of the
monetht of februar' Instant to Donalde Wilman burges of elgin
tile Ansuer to the borghe fundin one him be Johne blak burges of the
said' burghe that wranguislie and agan the law the said' Donald' has Intromettit
with xij barrellis of Salmonde ix barrellis of girls' and ane presentacioun' of
Salmond' quhilk pertenit to the said' Johne saltit with his avne salt
and pakit in his avne barrellis and markit with his mark and Aw to mak him
compt rekning and pament of the said' fische or ellis the vale of tham
as siclik fische was sauld' in flaundris or zeland' as law wile
and discernit to him the Copy of the said' borghe'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem octauo die
februarij anno quo supra

The said day the bailyes assignit this day xv dais to henry symsone
to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Johnne Red' for the wranguis'
riding and' Intrometing with ane meir of the said Johnez'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
decimo die mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said day Donald' Wilman burges of elgin grauntit
him to haue resauit be the handis of Jonhne blak burges
of Abirdene Sevin pundis tene Schillinigis and sex pennis
decernit to him be certane arbitouris and contenit in ane decret arbi
trale of the quhilkis vij li' x s' and vj d' he quietclamit and dischar
git the said' Johne blak his ayris executoris and assignez' for him his
auris executoris and assignez' now and foreuire

The said' day Donald' Wilman was fundin dischargit and quyt
of xvj s' Scottis money clamit be Williame blakhale of that
Ilk aving to vmquhile thome chapman

The said' day It was Sufficientlie preuit be diuers' famous' witnes
that thar was viij barellis of Salmond' and girls' takin avay
be my lady of huntlie and hir familiaris out of ane toune Callit
the Geruouche in murray tharof ij barellis pertenis to Donald' Wilman
burges of elgin and sex barellis to Jonhne blak markit with the saide Johnez'
mark and put in keping in the said' toune be sere Johne blak procurator
to the said' Jonhne vpone the quhilkis thai askit Certificacioun' vndir
the Selis of thomas Waus and thomas Wod' balyeis et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xj die
februarij anno quo supra

The said' day Androw portar was conuict be thir personis Dauid mar'
george bysset Alexander malysone Dauid fynne William Kintor patry
red' Williame Colp Androw stratone Androw lousone Androw barkar' Androw
litstar Dauid lame Androw stevinsone and Alexander gray suorne in ane assis'
be the moutht of Dauid mar' forspekar of the said' assis' for the brekin
of the burgis warde as he that was chargit be the balye and officiar'
to Reman within the tolbutht et cetera he passit furtht at his avne hande but
leyf askit or optenit

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xijo die mensis februarij
Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum est per Inquisicionem curie quod dominus Johannes Waus est legitimus et
propinquior heres quondam Johannis Waus patris suj

The said day Dauid Kintor grantit to entir WIlliam Dunbrek withtin xv dais
befor the aldirman and' bailyes to ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be William
Watsone for the wranguis' withhalding fra him of ane cow or ellis to an
suer the said day for the said' William Dunbrek

The said day Alexander hay lauchfully warnit callit and nocht comperit to ansueir'
at the Instance of mastir Johnne marscheall eftir the tenour of his bill of complant
tharfor the bailyes chargit Androw Nauchtj officiar to tak ane stras' of the sad'
Alexander and' lat It to borgh' gif it be askit And' warn' him to this day xv
dais gif it be lauchfull And' failyeing tharof the nixt lauchfull day thareftir
to ansueir to the said bill of complant at thrid' day of proces'

The said day the bailyes assignit monunday that nixt cumis to Johnne' lyntoun'
To ansueir to the borgh' fundin one him be Androw grig for the wranguis'
withhaldin fra him of xxvj d' And' failyeing that thai syt nocht that day
to ansueir to the said' borgh' one friday that nixt cumis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiijo die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said' day Androw balcromy was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' James
Colysone forspekar for tribulance of Johne abirdour' and the saide Johne
quyt of ale trubulance of the said' Androw and that was gevin for' dome
and Sandy chekar' Come Souerte be his hand vphaldin to entir the
said' androw one monunday that next Cumis within the tolbutht for the
amendis to be maid' for the said' trubulance

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xv die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said' day thomas Wod' diuers' tymes requerit thomas Waus
bailye to Caus' patry chernsid' to fulfil the deliuerance and ordinance
of the prouest and Counsale contenit in ane Act anent the Amendis ordanit
to be maid' to him be the said' patry and thareftir the saide bailye and the officiaris
at his commavnde chargit the said' patry to fulfil the said' deliuerance
quhilkis refusit and said' he wald' nocht fulfil the said' deliuerance nor nay thing'
contenit in the Act maid' tharupon for the deliuerance was fals' Ande thareftir the balye
assignit friday that next Cumis to the said' patry to Comper befor the
balyeis and Counsale to do it that accordis him to do anent the said' deliuerance
and Norman leslie officiar' at charge of the said' balye chargit and ordanit the
said' patry to Comper the said day et cetera

The said' day Comperit Androw litstar offering him redy tile ansuer' to the
borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne Wilyongsone as day assignit tharto
and the anent the spliing of ane pece of clatht quhilkis comperit nocht
tharfor the said' androw protestit for his costis et cetera and to be quyt of his
challance quhile he be new warnit

The said' day thome Ridale Come Souerte be his hande vphaldin
tile entir Androw balcrome one friday that nixt Cumis befor the aldirman
and balyeis one friday that next et cetera within the tolbutht et cetera tile vndirlie
thame and the Counsale for the Amendis to be maid' to Johne abirdour'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die
mensis februarij anno quo supra

The said' day magis scot cristiane Wellame cristj Prat in the name
of his wif was in ane Amerciament of the Court be thar avne tong'
graunt for brekin of commone ordinance in the brekin of the pace
of candill gevin to thame be the statutis of the toune

The said' day maly Antone was conuict' be ane Suorne asis'
Androw fyf forspekar for brekin of common ordinance in the brekin of the
pace of Candile making' et cetera

The said day the borgh' strikin be Richerd lister vpone Johne bawgerschaw
for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of xj s' viij d' was fundin of awaile
be ane suorne assis' Androu fyf forspekar / for the quhikis the said Johnne
was in amerciament of the court sic as he aucht to tyne of law And' to pay
the said xj s' viij d' to the said richerd' litster within terme of lawe

The said day the Alderman and baillies ordanit Spungeous' to tak all
the barrowis pannis skullis and Tubbis of all personis that layis mvke
or askis vppone the commone' kingis gait and hald' the sammyn as eschet
for dichting and clengeing of the towne

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die mensis
februarij anno quo supra

The said' day sere Johne ruthirfurd forspekar for gilbert prestone producit ane
chartir in Jugement vndir the sele of Williame blinsele Coupar making
mencion' the the said' William had' Infeft the said' gilbert heritablie be chartir
Selit with his seile of ane land' liand' within the said' burghe' in the nethir
kirkgat marcheand' to Sanct Katherynis hile one the southt partis
quhilk being red' the said' knicht forspekar requerit the said' William present
personalie to warand' defend' and keip to him the said' land' eftir the tenor
of his chartir maid' to him tharapon vndir his Seile the said' William alle
git that the said' matir was gret and askit the said' gilbertis peticioun'
in writ and ane lauchfule day to ansuer tharto the Court riplie auisit
ordanit the said' gilbert to gif to the said' William his peticioun' and Assignit
to him the law day eftir pashe next hereftir tile ansuer tharto /

The said' day Dauid Kintor grauntit him aving to thomas Watson'
thre stane of woll to be pait within terme of law

The said' day It was ordanit and diuisit be the aldirman and Counsale that
thai salbe Sex markis of the Rediast of the grissomes' of the takis
of the said' burghe' takin vp ande disponit be the aldirman and the
Counsale in wyne spice and vthir honorabile thingis in tyme of the
Natiuite of the prince of Scotland'

The said' day alexander hay lauchfullie warnit Callit and nocht comperit
tile anseur to Dauid Syme be Johne Cuk Officiar' was in ane
amerciament of the Court'

The said' day Robert themdale lauchfullie warnit caliit and nocht comperit
tile ansuer to Johne of murray et cetera anent the wrang done to him anent
the leding of certane stanys et cetera was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

Eodem die Robertus caus' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit thomam
Ridaile suum legitimum procuratorem actorem factorem et mandatum specialem ad petendum
ab Andrea mar' iiijor s' et ix d' monete scocie Et si necesse fuerit prosequendum
agendum defendendum promittens de Rato et grato Cum ceteris clausulis ne
cesaariis' et oportunis

The said' day Dauid Kintor' and Williame Watsone was oblist and suorne
the gret aithe to stand and abid' at the decret of William murray Duncan
Crail Androw barkar' and Androw Stevinsone anent ane Cow debatabile
betuix thame and gif neid' be to cheis' him ane odman et cetera quhilkis sale
deliuer herintile within x viij dais hereftir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis
marcij anno quo supra

The said' day Robert rede grauntit him dettour to patry arthour
for ix s' for ane bonat quhilkis the officiar' at commavnd' of the
balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said' day macome of crag grantit that he occupeit the croft
of vmquhile thomas Cullane

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis marcij anno quo supra

Eodem die Compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem Curie quod
marioria Red' est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam Alexander
Red' petfodellis patris suj

The said' day Alexander mathesone with Johne Cullane his forspekar
allegit him fear' of ane croft liand' in the terrotour' of the
croftis of Rubislaw et cetera clamit be gilbert menyeis tutor to
margaret rede douchtir and ayr tile vmquhile Alexander Red'
and askit ane day to produce his richt and the balyeis assignit
him monunday the viij day of merche Instant to produce and schew
his richtis befor thame quhilkis he has and wile vys' in the said'
matir

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto
die mensis marcij anno quo supra

The saide day george meldrum fear' of fyve Johne low and William
gregory Curatouris to the said Johne grantit thame to haue set
the Croft of vmwuhile thomas Cullan to malcum Crag and grantit
tham to defend' the said' assedacioun' in Safer' as law wile

The said' day the aldirman and balyeis assignit this day viij dais to
george talyour to Cum and se the land' that Katherine Cullan has in
coniunctfeftment be prisit and ordanit Johne Cuk seriand' to warne hir'
to cum and se the saide personis and Justice may be ministerit with Intimacioun' quhethir
scho Comper or nocht thai wile proced' and ministir Justice

The said' day Jonhne mar' one that ane part Ande malcome Crag one
that vthir oblist thame be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' and abid'
at the deliuerance and ordinance of Dauid menyes ser Johne ruthirfurd'
and gilbert menyeis anent the clame of ane Croft debatabile betuix thame
quhilkis sal deliuer tharintile within viij dais hereftir

The said' day gilbert prestone complenyeit to the aldirman and balyeis that patry leslie
hed' trubulit him quhilkis accusit denyit the said' tribulance And' in continent the
said' actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' of thir personis eftir writin
that is to say Dauid menyeis gilbert menyeis James Colisone Duncan Colison'
William portar patry red' William futhes Richerd' Waus thomas Watsone Androw
fyf Johne Ratre Duncane fyf Alexander malysone gilbert litstar and cristy prat quhilkis
riplie auisit the richtis resonis and allegacionis of batht the said' partiis herd' seyn'
and vndirstandin deliuerit be the moutht of the said' Dauid menyeis that thai coud'
nocht deliuer anent the said' trubulance becaus' the moving' and caus' of the said'
actioun' concernis the Richt of ane pece of land' in heritage quhilkis the said' patry
avnis be the law and Is in vys' of possessioun' of the samyn and consulit the aldirman
and balyeis to tak law borrouis of batht the said' partiis

Eodem die Johannes mar deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue ostendem quod gilbertus prestone
erit Indempnis pro patricio leslie aliter quam per viam Juris Et Andreas fyf deuenit
plegius legalis per manus sue ostendem quod dictus patricius erit Indempnis pro prefato gilberto
aliter quam per viam Juris et vtraque pars Obligatur ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes de
huiusmodi fideiussione per manus terras et lona'
